Package com.example.recipeoop_1.model

Class Recipe

java.lang.Object
com.example.recipeoop_1.model.Recipe
public class Recipe extends Object
Represents a recipe in the recipe management system.

This class is a MongoDB document, stored in the "recipes" collection (or category-specific collections like "recipe_desserts" depending on the service implementation). It contains details such as the recipe's title, ingredients, instructions, cooking time, category, and the user who created it.

Since:
2025-05-14

  • Field Details

    • id

      private String id
      The unique identifier for the recipe. This field is automatically generated by MongoDB if not provided. It is annotated with Id.

    • title

      private String title
      The title of the recipe (e.g., "Chocolate Cake").

    • ingredients

      private List<String> ingredients
      A list of strings, where each string represents an ingredient and its quantity (e.g., "2 cups flour", "100g sugar"). Initialized to an empty ArrayList to prevent null pointer exceptions.

    • instructions

      private String instructions
      The step-by-step instructions for preparing the recipe.

    • cookingTime

      private Integer cookingTime
      The estimated cooking time for the recipe, in minutes.

    • category

      private String category
      The category to which the recipe belongs (e.g., "Dessert", "Main Course", "Appetizer").

    • createdBy

      private String createdBy
      The username of the user who created this recipe. This field is used for tracking ownership and for authorization purposes.

      Default constructor for the Recipe class.

      Initializes a new instance of Recipe. Required by frameworks like Jackson for deserialization and by Spring Data MongoDB.
